attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prison population in England and Wales has hit a new all-time high, reaching 80,303 - breaking the previous record in just 24 hours.
Why not transform the system, not putting these people in prison but in a special British Army Regiment, for that will Re-Focus and Re-Educate these people. Making them feel a part of our society again. In turn the "Tax Payer" gets "benefits". This could be one of our most committed, dedicated units - not simply a bunch of "criminals" This would simply transform our Society. And cut Crime.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
